Description:
We are looking for a skilled Procurement Engineer to join our Supply Chain & Logistics team in Abu Dhabi, UAE. The ideal candidate should have a minimum of 5 years of experience in procurement and supply chain management. As a Procurement Engineer, you will be responsible for sourcing and purchasing materials, equipment, and services needed for our projects. You will work closely with the factory team to ensure timely delivery and cost-effectiveness. This role requires strong analytical and negotiation skills, as well as the ability to manage multiple suppliers and vendors.Responsibilities:Develop and implement procurement strategies to meet project requirements
Source and evaluate suppliers and negotiate contracts and pricing terms
Monitor supplier performance and ensure timely delivery of materials and services
Collaborate with sales and production team to identify material requirements and ensure timely procurement
Manage relationships with suppliers and vendors to resolve any issues or disputes
Perform cost analysis and identify opportunities for cost savings
Ensure compliance with company policies and procedures
Maintain accurate records of all procurement activities
Stay updated with industry trends and best practices in procurement and supply chain managementSkills
